participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and optimistic, always looking forward to new adventures.
participant_1.background: My family is always there for me, and I do my best to be there for them too. I am a student at a small community college. I'm allergic to shellfish. I love to read romance novels. I'm so excited to start my new life in San Diego, and I'm so grateful for my family's support.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and friendly, loves animals and enjoys creative outlets.
participant_2.background: I have to travel a lot for my work as a petsitter, and it's hard to keep up with my hair maintenance. My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion. I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills. I sing in a punk band. I like to ride my scooter.

content.text: Pretty good, thanks! I'm excited to be moving to San Diego soon!
Oh nice, I've heard that's a great place to live.
Yeah, I'm really looking forward to it! I'm moving there for school, and I'm excited to start my new life there.
That's great! What are you studying?
I'm studying business, and I'm hoping to get a job in marketing.
Awesome! That's a good field to be in.
So, what are you doing for fun in the meantime?
I'm working part-time as a barista, and I'm also in a punk band.
Oh cool! What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of punk and hardcore.
That's awesome! I love punk music.
We're actually playing a show in San Diego next month, if you're interested in coming!
Oh, I'm definitely interested! I'll have to check it out.
Awesome! I'll send you the details later.
